items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.

items.content_html: A lightweight virtual assistant built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to perform small yet essential tasks. It features a clean, user-friendly interface and can be easily customized or extended with additional functionalities to enhance productivity. Perfect for quick, everyday tasks!

items.content_html: Emoji-Mart is a lightweight and user-friendly web application designed for searching and browsing emojis efficiently. With a visually appealing design, it provides category filters and a search bar for an intuitive and fun emoji exploration experience.
